content.detailedDescription: December 16th approximately 10:00 pm, my wife and i were driving home from seeing a movie. as we pulled on to the street that we live on, we noticed a very large triangular object about to cross over our street approximately 2 blocks in front of us. it appeared to be about 100 feet in the air, and it was moving very slowly as it meandered through the sky in front of us. it was very large, metallic, and appeared to be a black or dull finish that did not reflect much light. it was outlined with lights. most of the lights were white, although there may have been some blue or green lights mixed in. one of the first things that struck us as odd was that with our windows rolled up, it seemed to be making no sound. we rolled our windows down and could hear only a very light hum / rumble. it was first spotted to the left of us, crossed over and continued to our right. all along moving slowly in one direction. we took a right at the next street available in an attempt to get a better look. we did see it again for just a moment. we then lost it in the trees, and it seemed to be gone. we drove around for a short distance hoping to spot it again, but it was no longer visible. at no time did we feel threatened, nor did we experience interruption in the operation of our vehicle, the radio, the lights ...Etc...We then drove home.
content.summary: Very large triangle shaped object crossed the road in front of us.

content.detailedDescription:
We went out to have a cigarette in front of the house. my friends girlfriend saw them so we started filming on his phone. before we got the chance to get the phone there were several different objects that had disappeared. we had no idea what it could be. the objects were scattered and moving in very random motions, during the video we filmed four of the lights line up in a straight line. another object comes from the very bottom right of the video and starts to float up towards the others. we were freaking out (sorry for the language). i was very shocked and still am about it. i dont have the file on my phone (which im using to do this). please look at it on youtube.Com. we want to find out what the lights were. if you look up "[search info moved to fi section/cms/tg]" it should be the video with the video uploader named "[member nickname moved to fi section/cms/tg]". i believe you would enjoy it.

thank you! [name removed/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We saw these over the east mountain range in provo utah while having a cigarette

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up at 2am because the sound of a really loud helicopter went by on the beach in front 
of me. it looked like a black army helicopter.
it was very very loud and sounded like it was going to crash actually.
then my dog wanted out and i was trying to get back to sleep and was staring out my window
to the south and there was a very low and very fast flying white ball of light.
it was not falling but streaking over my neighbors house and off to the east.
too fast to film! but i have been seeing these very often.
they are not drones because they go so fast.
content.summary: Fast white fireball flying in a straight line fast and low!

content.detailedDescription: Nick and i were sitting in the backyard.  i was looking straight up east and saw a very quick meteorite from north to south at about 8 p.M.  so i thought that it was a good night for more viewing.  i turned to the west and stared up near the constellation cassiopeia at about 8:30 p.M.  i said what is that?, to nick.  i thought it was a cylindrical object spinning on its long axis.  nick, whose eyes are probably better than mine, said, it looked like 3 points of light length wise and the two out side lights were spinning around the center. it was silent(no drone sound) and it flew between cassiopeia and the moon before fading and the whole flight took about 15 seconds to pass.  we watched it fade as it passed the moon.  i felt that it could be a spy satellite, since i've heard of them flying north to south before, from a friend.
content.summary: It flew north to south.

content.detailedDescription:
This was the first time i have ever seen physical unexplainable phenomenon in the sky in my life, although i have some very credible family members and others i know who have had ufo experiences.

these were star-like points of light, starting with one, moving in unnatural patterns, absolutely silent in a place and under conditions where one hears "everything".  their motion seemed intelligent and playful and the shaman said that he knows them and that they are intelligent life-forms, but hesitated to say much more.  i suppose that high-tech fakery would be possible but i know these people and know that they are not involved in anything like that, and furthermore there is a very dense history of these sightings in this region, with a large portion of the population being direct witnesses to these strange phenomenon, which are commonly believed to be witches, and have been seen as long as history goes back around here.

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

I came outside at approximately three-thirty am est to smoke.  i was sitting on my porch looking at the sky and clouds when a gray reflective boomerang craft appeared from behind cloud cover in a right banking turn..  i lost the object behind a tree for a few seconds and it reappeared the continued it flight path until it disappeared behind additional cloud cover.  the object had no running lights.
content.summary: Boomerang shape gray reflective craft came out from behind cloud in a right banking turn and disipered behind  cloudcover.

content.detailedDescription: Whent out on the porch to see what my dogs were barking at and notice a very bright star.When it stat to move up to where it was above tree level to where i could see it,it only took 5 minites it was hanging about a mile away from my location in hoosire national forest.I watched with binoculars and the oblect shot out three smaller balls of light that arched and fell toward the ground then about ten minits later shot two more balls out that did the same thing.The wole tim i obseved this the oblect was a ver bright white to the naked eye but through the binoculars had a hint of blue. i watced for a few more minites and the light dulled and i could see a disc shaped object it slowly went strait down as if to land.There is a hudge open area back where it was at where there are some old unused oil wells wanted to drive over and hike in but recovering from back surgury wouldnt have gotten very far pluse i was kinda creep out and i thik my curiosity migt have got the best of me.I see a lot of stange stuff and i go through a series of tests before i can say without a doubt unexplanded this was one i could not explain away.I tried takeing pictures of this i have seen it before not for this duration when i went to take the pictures my camra was dead strange thing was i took the battery off the carger and it works fine now and before cant explain that.The other thing my dogs got very quiet after the things were shot out in fact it was so in the arer it was erir it gave me the creeps and i dont spook easily.
content.summary: Very bright star like object to bright to be star

content.detailedDescription: I was in my house at the time. i was sitting on my couch and i looked outside. i saw this very bright object, so bright i could not look directly at it.  moving very slowly across the sky. when i first saw it i was very scared until i realized i was not going in my direction. i lost sight of the object when it went behind a cloud.
content.summary: Bright orange object, moving extremely slow

content.detailedDescription:
i check the database for recent sightings in my state of wyoming just to see if there are any sightings that were similar to mine in october of 2010. the recent sighting that was reported in wyoming just today (12/16 0r 17) sounds very similar to mine which i have reported through mufon before.
  i happened to step outside for a cigarette on october 14th of 2010 if i can remember about 330ish am, when i noticed a star like light flickering to the north of town. i used to live in an apartment building across the street of the cole shopping center safeway, which it was across the parking lot, nrth of town that i noticed this star like object. from my view point and location it appeared to be in the area of where the water tower north of cheyenne is. i kept my eyes paced because it would rapidly change colors from green to red, white, purple, blue back to green, at a rapid pace, sort of how some stars in the galaxy do so at certain elevations from the sun's reflection. the thing that threw me off a bit was the fact that it looked like a star, but too bright for where it was located, which from my perception was right outside of town. it was just too bright and too close to be a "star." as i watched the beautiful show of color change happen, i took notice to movement of this star. throughout the safeway parking lot are light post. it was set up slightly to the left of one of them from my location. as i observed, this star like object appeared to slowly move to the right, right behind the light post and stopped. it was very odd, but i didn't want to rule it out as a "ufo" since it had star like features. as i moved over to the right so i could see it it my view again, it then moved over to the left very slowly, right behind the light post again. at this point i was pretty creeped out, thinking that this was something other than a star because you don't see a star move left to right, right to left at slow speeds. to reassure myself that i was seeing what i was, i moved back over to the left for this "star" to be back in my view. next thing you know, it moves again over to the right, right behind the light post again! it was off in the distance but i strongly felt that whatever i spotted knew that i had it locked on. i couldn't believe what was going on, so i ran inside to get another witness (my girlfriend) just to reassure that i wasn't just seeing things like some sort of lunatic! i woke her out of bed and had her come outside to view this occurrence. as we stepped outside i pointed it out and it was stationary, sitting dead still like a star would. she sort of got upset at the fact that i dragged her out of bed to see a "star" but as i told her to keep watching, probably about a minute or so later, this "star" started moving again, slowly towards the right and slightly upwards (eastern direction.) she took notice right away at the fact that it went from dead still to moving towards the east at a somewhat faster rate of speed than i saw it move earlier. she then stated "it looks like it's moving towards the right..." and no sooner as she finished that sentence, this light stopped dead still again, rose, and disappeared as if it "beamed" out. i felt like falling over from being highly overwhelmed at what i just saw and she became highly uncomfortable as if something was watching us. i didn't want to have that feeling at the time i witnessed it before i brought her into the picture but i in fact in the back of my mind felt like this "star" knew that i was watching it. i couldn't believe what i had seen, and as we went back into the our apartment, i was pretty uneasy and just in shock at what had just happened. i had seen strange occurrences before that, but nothing as in the flesh as that, and to this day almost every single day that pops up in my mind, therefore anytime i step outside, i tend to gaze to the sky, day or night to see if i witness anything as spectacular and unexplainable as we did that early morning. 
 as i stated before, i can relate to this recent sighting made in this month (december 2011) because i in fact feel that these star like/lights know that you are watching and that no matter how far away you are, etc... it'll do whatever it can to "blend" in as a star or some sort of man made aircraft and once somebody actually takes notice, that is when you notice its evasiveness. 
  i also want to state that i was contacted by wyoming's mufon investigator through an email, and as i replied to the email that i received, which i believe was back in january or february, i never received a reply back about this occurrence. i have had within this past year and a half, about 3 or 4 other occurrences happen, all that i have reported on. all i can say is, keep your eyes peeled at the sky and don't be afraid to speak up about anything odd that you see but know how to decipher something that is man made opposed to unidentifiable.
content.summary: Wyoming recent sighting december 2011

content.detailedDescription: I know this happened, it zig zagged, then went straight for a bit, then suddenly switched directions.  i watched all of the other stars in the sky and nothing else was moving. it looked just like a star.  this is it, i know that they are out there.  i am no longer a skeptic, as i know we aren't alone and haven't been for years.  i was about 12 and my eyesight was perfect.  i went into the house to get my mom and it was gone.
content.summary: Watch it in the sky for about 15 minute zig zag straight then do it again.

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend, me,  and 2 friends were hiking in the idaho panhandle near ball lake. we all laid down to sleep under the stars about 10 pm or so.  i dont remember the exact timebut it was dark. i couldnt sleep because i was too cold so a couple hours passed and i was the only one awake. i was in my sleeping bag in an inchwrom like position with stomach facing the ground, huddled up trying to get warm when i lifted my head up after hearing something only to find a flashlight-type light staring into my face about 4 inches from my face. at first i thought someone was shining a bright light into my face but then i reallized the size of teh light was too big to be a standard flashlight. my eyes were wide in disbelief. it stayed there for about  5 seconds, maybe more, just looking at me and i at it  and then took off so fast in an archlike path but straight up where it produced a pink like glow as it reached a certain point. it got there faster than anything i have ever seen. once it was up there (it was a clear, starfilled night sky), i woke my boyfriend up and excitedly told him to look up in the sky and see the light that was literally right in front of my face not seconds earlier. he shrugged it off saying it was a comet and nothing more. i repeatedly told him no, it absolutley wasnt. he didnt think much of it and rolled back over to sleep while i watched the light over a period of about 15 minutes which over that period of time, it faded in intensity of light.  at first i had a moment of surprise and then i realized this was not normal, for a light to be shining in my face and a small bit of fear crept in. it was then that it took off up into the sky at lightning speed. i let the site of the object go after i knew it was fading over time and tried to get some sleep. i finally fell asleep only to wake in the morning to tell the others of my story and to have my boyfriend discredit and make fun of me while i was doing so. it made me mad, that i was not taken seriously.
content.summary: Mountain camping, bright light directly 4 inches from my face and then it sped off into space and hovered for 15 + minutes and faded

content.detailedDescription:
I apologize that this is second hand, but my family member who experienced this never wished it reported. now it can be. i hope that it might be associated with other events in the area about that time, providing added proof that something did occur in the area of the maheur national forest, nw of burns oregon at that time. the month is correct (oct), the day could have been any day during deer season. 
my aunt, uncle and a large group of friends were camped at morgan springs in the malheur national forest. it was dark and the days hunt over. as usual everyone was around the fire. this was rugged country. i've been to this spot in the 70's and 80's. very hard to find and to get there with vehicles. theirs was the only group at that site.
let me state that my aunt was the national chairman of a prestigious real estate concern. listed in who's who, very successful, logical and level headed.
she was walking around the group with a tray of snacks. she stated that it soundlessly glided into view just above the tree tops. these would be large ponderosa pines. it stopped, hovering, not directly overhead but about 50 feet away at a 45 degree angle, about 100 ft above the ground. about half the craft was visible, saucer shaped, she estimated it to be at least 100 ft wide, but i don't recall how thick it was. 
everyone freaked out, women screamed, men yelling, some went for their hunting rifles. she said it was so close and so obvious what it was, that nobody said anything like "what is it". everyone knew. there were "windows", for lack of a better term. i don't recall if they were visible as it came into sight or not. i think she said they appeared after it stopped to hover. a yellow light was visible, apparently eminatting from the crafts interior. she said the shapes of more than one humanoid body was visible and movement was easily discerned with the yellow back light. no features were seen as no light was directed in to the craft from the outside. she said that the movements were fluid, natural, but seemed uncharictoristic of normal human movement. proportions were odd as well. she said they seemed to be curious about them, moving to get diffent looks into the campsight. 
at this point, only a few seconds have passed. she was a camera buff and she dropped the tray and ran to the camping vehicle to get her 35mm. she had to load it and said she may have been inside the camper for 3 minutes max.
when she emerged, camera in hand, the entire group was still and calm. the craft gone. some of those that hadn't left the fire area were again seated. a couple of the group that ran were slowly walking back. two men with hunting rifles were stone still and seemed catatonic for another couple of minutes.
she asked what happened, where the saucer went, etc.
slowly, she started to get responses, simple ones, like "what"? soon, they regained their wits.
she was frantic, demanding answers... they all, including her husband, acted like she'd lost her mind. they had no explanation or memory of why some were away from the fire, holding guns or unable to recall the tray of snacks being dropped by her as she ran for her camera. she was incredulus, and being a strong willed, confident woman, she demanded answers and insisted her story was true and it was they who were daft. it got heated. her husband, my uncle, finally felt embarrassed enough to demand her silence and in the coming days she agreed, at his request, to never tell this story. to my knowledge, i am the only one she told.
obviously, she believes the metal skin of the camper protected her from whatever caused the memory loss to the others.
her and my uncle are the greatest people i've ever known. i need no additional proof. i simply believe her. hopefully, if any other events took place in that area, this will add weight to their accounts.
the biggest hole in my story is that i am unsure of the year. she told me this story in the early 70's i and can't recall how many years previously the event happened. sorry about that.
good luck with your efforts, hope we all get concrete proof one day soon.
content.summary: Wilderness of oregon. large saucer, very close, witnesses suffered memory loss.

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: In marion nc in 1989 i was with my parents going to church ,we just got on the interstate maybe traveled an eighth of a mile and it was starting to get dark and i saw in tha woods a blue orb floating above the creek bed traveling as fast as we were on the interstate.Going up and down in that creek and below the tree tops doing this for about 1mile.I told my parents about it when i saw it and they were so amazed at this object and when we got to the restarea it came up into the sky and floated above a pond behind the restarea and toke off like a streak of lightning into tha sky.By tha way the leaves where off tha trees at this time of year
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was with parents saw orb also close to interstate 100 to 500 ft away floating in creek bed

content.detailedDescription: I was heading home from omaha nebraska,after a long day at work. my boss was at the wheel, and my son in the back, and i in the passenger seat of a ford king cab truck. i had been very depressed, and i began daydreaming as i looked to the stars in the sky. not actually the stars, "one star".  i recall being so sad about my life and how messed up it seemed. thinking about my children and how much i felt i'd failed being a good parent. while i continued contemplating what to do in my life, i noticed the star i'd been staring at begin to quiver, and because i had been so deep in thought, i began blinking to assure that my eyes were clear, and that i had actually seen what i thought i'd seen, and low and behold, it was real! i made sure i didn't take my eyes off that quivering star, as i didnt want to miss anything i was seeing, and that is when the quivering star id been watching, actually began to bounce like a bouncing ball. when it would almost be done bouncing, it shot off to the side, left then right, bouncing, as i stated like a child that would drop a bouncing ball, and then walk away from it, it would eventually bounce less and less, until it would stop.  i, once i was sure that i was seeing this amazing event, was so ecstatic, i said to my son, "son i want you to look up into the sky, straight up, and tell me your seeing what i am seeing, he then turned and looked into the sky, and said "is it going like this?", as he began to pretend he was bouncing a ball in his hand.  i said, "yes it is," and remember thinking to myself, thank god he saw it too!  we watched that bouncing star from omaha, all the way back home, at the time in roca, ne., which is about an hour away from each other. shortly before the event,just days actually, my brother had loaned me his telescope and my son and i watched our bouncing star for about a 1/2 hour, and then i began to sense a strong fear, and decided i'd seen enough, and my son and i went inside, where i felt we'd be safe.
content.summary: I thought it was a star way up in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
on the night of the sighting, it was cool and nice outside. my step-mom was sitting in as bay window, with windows and blinds open, on our house watching tv in her and my dads room. my step-sister was sitting in the living room with the windows and the blinds open, both step-mom and step-sister letting the night air in. both parties sitting next to open windows were on the same side of the sighting.
   
     my father and i were located in my bedroom and were playing a video game. my blinds and window was also open due to the nice night. the air was cool and the skys were partly cloudy. as my dad and i were playing the game, we were destirbed by lots of neighborhood dogs barking and gathering in the street. the dogs were congragating near a light post located approximatley 75 to 100 feet from my bedroom window and directly in front of the house. we paused the game and began watching the dogs. after a few minutes, my dad left the room and went to his room to retrieve a pair of bynoculars to get a closer look at the dogs. i had a pair in my room and i retrieved mine as well. when my dad returned to my room, we turned the tv off to darken the room and began trying to focuse on the pack of dogs.

     the part of the whole ordeal seemed strange becsuse some of the neighborhood dogs that were gathered would normaly not get along. we began to focuse in on the dogs. we noticed the dogs were barking while looking up into the sky. we talked about why they might be behaving like this for a few moments then began to look towards the sky, to the right of the house, when all of the sudden a bright light from up above burst in through the window causing my father and i to fall backwards onto the floor. prior to the light, my dad and i were on our knees looking out the window. when we came to and regained our sight. we were laying on the floor next to each other. now we both understand that our bynoculars would have magnified the light, but i know the light was bright to begin with. i looked back out the window and caught a glimps of a craft in the air that appeared to slowly floating away. the craft floated behind a cloud or into some type of fog and disapeared for good.

     when we regained our composure, we went into the living room and said "did you see that" to my step sister. she stated "what are yall talking about". we stated "the dogs and the bright light". she stated "no" and went back to watching tv. we left the living room and went to my dads room where my step-mother had been sitting in the bay window watching tv. we asked her the same questions and she stated she had heard the dogs earlier but had not observed any type of flash or light. 

     my dad and i looked out the bay window real fast and realized that the dogs were gone. my dad and i went outside of the residence and walked to the neighbors house. the neighbor was outside working in and around his gargage. we asked him if he had observed anything and he stated no. he did state that his dog had ran off earlier, but the dog had returned sometime earlier. after investigating the situation for sometime, my dad and i concluded that all the dogs that we had observed were back at their homes and that people had observed the dogs acting funny but had not observed the light.

     the part of the incident that still puzzles my dad and i is the fact that what seemed to take a few seconds, like looking at the dogs, seeing the light and coming to on the floor had apparently taking some time because everyone stated they had observed anbd heard the dogs ealrier but not recently when asked. we thought that the flashj happened and a few seconds later we were up and asking about the incident. we dont remember the, as people stated "some time" went. the dogs had been home for "somne time", we heard the dogs "earlier", we observed the dogs "earlier". there is time missing and neither my dad or i remember what happened during the missing time.

p.S. i am an investigator at a local police department and this has puzzled my to this day.
content.summary: Bright light, strange k-9 activity, missing time line

content.detailedDescription:
I was drinking my coffee, i woke up tired that morning. i went outside after hearing my dog barking. she was tangled in the bushes behind our fence. the manner was unlike she could tangle herself. the knot was high up in the bushes. i untangled the dog and then went back inside and got another cup of coffee. as i was coming down the basement steps i saw some hair on the bottom step. it was blonde and looked like it had been cut and left there. i have a sample of this hair to this day.
shortly after i began drawing a picture, what i imagined in my head of the being who left the hair on my bottom step.
i have "memories" of this being, and being intimate with her on several occasions. i use quotations because they do not feel like memories. they are somewhat clouded and dream like, though vivid at times.
i do not have the means to have this hair that was left verified as extraterrestrial. i am seeking you're help with this problem. i am not altogether clear on whether this is fantasy or real incidents happening to me.
the being is a blonde woman around my age. almost human in every aspect but for the larger than usual eyes which are almond shaped yet human like and blue.
please get back to me and give me an address to send these hair samples to.
content.summary: Found hair sample

content.detailedDescription:
i stepped outside my house to take the garbage out.  i have pretty frequently seen what look like star-like objects that hover around and sometimes change direction or shoot off at fast speeds, so i've taken the habit of watching fairly frequently for them. there's an empty field next to my house on the west end of town which allows for pretty clear star gazing.  i was looking up in the western sky and spotted one of these star-like objects was hovering around, changing color and intensity.  
  i started to look around and noticed some airplanes and a shooting star.  as i was looking around i noticed a very large bright orange sphere to the north of me.  it surprised me because it seemed to appear out of nowhere and i had probably been outside for ten minutes at this point.  as i watched it flashed and expanded into a long cylinder shape, horizontally.  it stayed orange but seemed to almost radiate.  it was intense in color and brightness, but almost seemed to have a softness to it, nit like street lamps.  it appeared to just be on the outskirts of town, which is less than a mile from me, but it was really hard to judge distance, i must know it looked big.  
  shortly after it changed size it began to move in my direction.  i tried to stay and watch but it scared me and i went inside my house.  i had an eerie feeling that it noticed me, which made me quite unnerved, but it could have just been the surprise as it appeared out of nowhere.  
  after about ten minutes i went back out to see if it was still there.  i could not immediate spot it.  after scanning the sky i noticed a bright orange sphere much higher in the sky, directly overhead and appearing to be similar.  i watched it for awhile not noticing any movement.  i went out several more times throughout the night not seeing anything else.
content.summary: Bright orange object above town

content.detailedDescription: Moving in formation east to west in triangle pattern. airline traffic almost always north and south into and out of orlando.  cape canaveral approximately 50 miles due east.  three reddish/orange glowing objects moving across sky in a triangular pattern with two objects followed by a third. disappeared into clouds.  was in car when wife spotted them.  stopped car, got out and observed strange lights moving across sky not making any noise.  recorded lights on iphone video.  almost looked like large flares but they were much too large.  sky was dark as nighttime had commenced.  was stunned by the sighting.
content.summary: Three lights moving n formation

content.detailedDescription:
The 3 pictures are from dec 15 thursday: we first noticed a small line at the bottom of the sky was very lit up over a field like daytime but it was about 9:45 pm at night. i stopped to try and get pictures of the sky thinking that my camera would pick that up because it's so bright (my camera is not night time friendly) but got more than i realized. while taking a picture of the skyline, i captured the source, 3 lights hovering around this field. very interesting to see what ever it was! the lights were at times very low to the ground almost touching it and sometimes up to the treeline, after about 4 to 5 mins they took off out of sight maybe behind a cloud. it was cloudy and rainy out as well.

*dec 14 wednesday - headed for that same field area: just the night before we seen a orange star like object that was just ahead of us as we were driving, it headed to a flashing air plane tower (or whatever those are called radio/tv towers?) that's by the gas station. i got out of the car at the gas station and watched it hover over the tower for about 3 mins. then it started heading right for me as it got closer directly over my head i could make out the lights to be 4 total - 3 white and 1 red it was shaped like a triangle and was dark, possibly black or very dark grey. there was absolutely no sound and the odd part was it went right to the tower, hovered, then back to me but i did not see it turn around or make any turn what so ever,like it just went in reverse? after it went by me it headed back toward the same field where i seen the smaller lights on thursday dec 15 it flew off very fast and was gone.
*from a distance this object looks like a moving star, just a single light,orange or amber in color(almost like its on fire). this is the first time i got a good close look at it from underneath! i have seen this object in the area now a few times. it has been showing up allot this past week in the same area. almost like it's on a path there and back every time with brief hovering stops along the way.

i briefly looked around and seen 2 people getting into their car at the gas pump they were looking at it as well. they drove off slowly toward the tower watching and then went on i am assuming.
content.summary: Ufo star like lights hovering and moving over field in tn. lit up the lower part of the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Seems like it was a spring day, as it was not extremely hot.  we didn't need to wear jackets either.  my mother, brother 8 and myself 10 would walk to the nearest woods, which was 1\4 mile south of where we lived. we would talk and bond holding hands.  all of a sudden we both looked at mom and back to the ship and back to mom.  she looked at both of us and said never to repeat the incident, for no one would believe us.  i dont even remember telling our grandparents which we lived with at the time.  the object was a long cigar shaped object with one end pointed.  there were no windows, lights or any sound emitting from the object.  all of a sudden, as if it knew it had been spotted, went from a horizontal position, hovering above the woods, to almost a vertical position, somewhat in a slow motion movement. it thrust out into space, without a noise, or any sign of emissions.  only leaving the impression of a dot until it was gone.  all we could do at that point was laugh histerically in some state of shock.  needless to say, we didn't go any further. we walked back home and never talked of it again.  i have only recently talked with a couple other believers. forty eight years later.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovered 50 ft above woods horizontally, turned up vertically and shot straight into space leaving only a dot of the rearend.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a family member were sitting on her back porch discussing god. the end of the world area 51 the tech leap after that when a shooting star caught our eye to the right. then every star in the sky in front of us started blinking like crazy and turning colors . then we noticed a fleet of white lights moving from right to left in front of us and as they went by the stars behind them quit blinking and turning colors. this lasted from about 3am to 3:15 am and we were both blown away by what we just wittnessed especially bcuz we were just talking about god and aliens.
content.summary: Every star in sky started blinking and changing colors as we witnessed what i would describe as a fleet of ufos went by.I know the stars cant do that so i assume that something was between my line of sight and the stars. it was the most amazing thing.

content.detailedDescription:
Ojects/lights had been appearing in the distant sky for a couple of weeks.  this particular night, they were much closer.  we lived on a hill very near 2 water towers.  we and other neighbors were on our front porches watching for the lights to appear.  out of no where appeared 1 very large white light.  it zipped across the sky at amazing speed, making no noise and moving faster than any plane or jet.  it stopped suddenly hovered for a few minutes.  

3 disc shaped objects appeared from behind the white light.  2 moved together and disappeared over a hill.  the other traveled from east to west away from the large bright light.  the large bright light just disappeared.  we all watched the smaller object move across the sky at amazing speed, stopping, ascending at even higher speeds then reappearing in a different part of the sky and then zigzagging back and forth rapidly.  the larger object eventually reappeared a bit closer to our house.  the small disc moved to the larger object and hovered nearby.  the other 2 discs appeared flying over the water towers, probably clearing them by no more then 50 feet.  one was slightly in front of the other as in a formation.  both were domed disc shaped objects, approximately 75 - 100 ft. in diameter, with what appeared to be windows but we couldn't see in them.  both also had lights circling the bottom of the discs that alternated in a red to green pattern.  

there was no noise as they glided past us and toward the bright white object.  i ran toward their flight path.  my mother was yelling at me to get back to the porch.  i just wanted to see them up close and was hoping they would actually land and make contact.  as they approached the bright white object, they, along with the third disc, begin flying in patterns circling around the white object.  they seemed to somehow join with the white object which then began glowing even brighter.  suddenly, it shot straight up with such speed it quickly became a small dot like the stars in the sky and then disappeared.

there was no doubt these were not any sort of plane or jet or anything made on this earth.  i was around 8 years old at the time.  all the adults were excited about what had just happened.  we didn't see the lights anymore that summer but did in following years.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple discs fly over and take different paths

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend saw these lights again last night. they seem like stars, you have to actually focus on a star to be able to find them, then the objects go from being a still light to a moving light, very small like a star, these objects must be very high. they move and stop changing direction, making turns and disappearing. location is in the nj pine barrens. they are very visible without telescope or binoculars.
content.summary: Star like objects stopping and turning

content.detailedDescription:
ufo prob/fbi/cia?
                                           27 aug 08
   i was leaving work around 12:25 pm, 27 aug 08, ellington fld, houston, tx-- i was going home to evacuating from hurricane gustav.
   i notice this object, as i was at the top of i-45 over pass going south towards pearland, tx.  i slowed down to get a closer looked at this object- it was suspended 12 to 14 above dixie farm rd next to the race track gas station.  i looked for cables or something that it could be hanging from, but nothing, it was stationary in sky on its own.  i drove under it and kept going.  i looked in my rear view mirror half the distance to beamer and it was still there, i know, i was not the only one that saw this object. the sky was clear blue bird day, something came over me- (traumatized), i carry a camera with me all the time, which i use with my job.  its funny; i never thought about stopping and calling 911 or take a photo of the object. 
    the objected it looked like a surveillance probe; cjylinder with pdark windows around the top, the object was 4 to 5 feet in length, approx 10 inches to 12inches  in diameter.    the object was stationary in a vertical stance and never moved-no noise- i heard about ufo probes before, but never seen one like this.. when i got home i told my wife about what i had saw.   the sky was so clear it would have made a great clear photo i called my brother-n-law and told him what i had seen.   he said, he saw something like this on discovery channel... that the fbi and cia...Might have.
   this photo is the area where the probe was seen and the photo of the probe is one that i made on photo-shop model to show what i saw.  this is not the original photo of the probebut is of the location and what the probe looked liked.     iiepm an certified aircraft inspector and been around aircraft for forty-two years,   i have seen two ufo disc -- one over arizona in 1974 when the vietnam war was ending...  the disc was flying below the airline in a zigzagged motion near the desert floor....I did go for my camera in the upper bin and when i returned it was gone...
the third ufo was sighted over trinity bay in  2009 around 09:00 in the spring, i was in the process of moving to another fishing locations when i looked up to the horizon to get my bearing for the next fishing spot.    when, i looked up just about the horizon was a glowing red orange dish moving slow away from me.  the craft was about, maybe two miles moving east. here is a website of the disc i saw.    as i was watching the craft it just vanished.  no clouds in the sky over the area of the craft...      
october 10, 2011  
 leave for work at 5:30 am and will traveling west on hwy-35, i saw a shooting star streak across my windshield over horizon..Coming in a northeast direction. while  watching it, the object came to an abrupt stop in middle  of the sky for a few seconds and started travel to the north at a slower speed.  i watched it fade out in the north skies.  i have been working on aircraft an around them for forty some years and never seen an aircraft streaking across the sky and come to a full stop in less than a second. 
(name moved to fi box) cms 12/17/11 23:05 cst flg
content.summary: More than one sighting over my life time...I just list them all...

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming back from my sons birthday party in gray, me. it was exactly 4:03pm. i used a i phone camera with no zoom. so it took a good photo of the whole field. i had take many of photo's of the same area and even seconds before and after this luminous object appeared with in seconds. and it was gone in the next frame. i zoomed in and looked at it closely. there was no planes in the area. the sun was soon to set. the crows were quiet at the time. the sun was shining bright. the time i was there, i didn't see or hear anything unusual. i didn't see the object until i got home to delete my photo's. that is when i noticed something shinning in front of the tree line. there was no house or truck there. those don't disappear in seconds! 

i have never seen a ufo up-close. i even looked on google map to see a road where it was. i was 425.665 yards away.In one photo you can see a crow in the sky. size of a dot from where i was standing. i used a measuring map online. it took me this long to crop and see the photo's myself. i hope someone can analyze these. i also am a photographer and have a keen eye. when the sun hit the object, the front shape is all that shows up.

i also been studying ufo/abductions since 2005. so i know the shapes and what they can do. etc.  please let me know what you find out after.
thank you:)
write to me in my email and let me know.  
as you can see in the photo's the time is 4:03pm. all taken with in 1 minute.   
*photo numer 41, 44 is before it appears
*photo 47 is the ufo
*photo 48 is right after
content.summary: I was taking photos of crow on the edge of corn field. i got home to delete photo's and noticed something shinny in the background. where i was there didnt notice with the naked eye.

content.detailedDescription:
Was at my boyfriend's house in vista, ca (north san diego county).  had back pain and woke up about 3 a.M. & had coffee.  went outside to have a smoke and was stargazing. 

starlike, then planet-like
noticed 2 unusually bright "stars" on opposite sides of the sky that aroused my curiosity, for they appeared to be pulsating and getting brighter and larger at times.  they were unusually low in the sky (for stars) as well.  at varying intervals they would both illuminate around their edges and reveal their definite circular shape.  sometimes they almost looked like planets with an eclipse, with the light source behind them. 

changed position in the sky
over the course of 2 hours the objects changed position in the sky, as well as distance from me.  one started out low, then gradually higher.  other other was higher and got lower as time passed.

projected 2 v-rays of light
at various times, both of these objects brightened and simultaneously projected 2 rays that looked like an upside down v.  to clarify this, there were 2 rays projecting downward at 30-45 degree angles.  i was taken aback by the synchronicity of the two objects.  when one would illuminate and project the rays, i would turn my head to the other and see the same thing happen to the other one.

noise
a lot of the time there was a very soft, high-pitched beeping (key of c?) that seemed to be everywhere, sort of like when a neighbor goes to work and their clock radio alarm goes off while they're gone, and it goes on and on and on...... the sound appeared to be surrounding me instead of being from a definite source that i could turn my ear to.  i was so engaged with the lights that i ignored the sound after a while.  don't know how long the sound lasted.  could have been someone's alarm.

other bright objects in a row
there were other bright blinking lights that appeared to be in formation very low in the sky, that i was also watching, but focused on the 2 main ones.


witness
shortly after first observing i had to wake my boyfriend up out of a dead sleep to come see, just to make sure i wasn't hallucinating!  he staggered out with his glasses half asleep and did say, "you mean that bright star that's blinking with the streaks coming out of it?  it's probably a planet."  he went back to bed just before it did the illuminated circle thing!  

i even have a secondhand telescope i just bought in the trunk of my car, but didn't know how to set it up so i didn't want to fuss with it and miss the light show!  i'm getting that puppy set up tonight --just in case!

feel free to call if you need clarification on anything.
content.summary: At first appeared to be pulsating stars on opposite sides of the sky, then illuminated with clear circle shape like an eclipse, simultaneously projecting  2 rays downward like an upside down v.  watched for 2 hours!

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking out of my bathroom window when i noticed an strange blinking red lite. i watched it as it hovered at about 4:45 over what seemed to be sunrise highway which is a 1/2 mile from my house. the lite slowly started moving east then stopped and hovered a while before slowly moving in a westerly direction yet never moving too far away. i realized early on that this lite was actually two lights and it was blinking from left to right.
i ran in to get my phone to see if i could get it on video or get some stills but was unable to see it in the view finder. i went outside to my car to get my ipod as it has a better video recorder but still couldn't catch it. as i was outside watching this lite my food was being delivered and i showed  the guy what i was looking at. he found it strange as well so i saw my neighbor and pointed it out to him and we both asked how whatever it was could be sitting up there without falling out of the sky because it wasn't moving most of the time it was up there. i went back inside with my food and at this point i'd been watching my new friend for almost an hour. i called news 12 long island but they said there wasn't anything they could do. i called mufon and got the number of an investigator in ny and called him. i spoke to him while still watching this lite now slowly moving west. at around 6:05 the object was moving in a northern direction and was still visible behind the treeline in the distance about 2 miles away as it slowly moved beyond my sight.
i've seen many things in the skies here on long island and clearly there's some major activity that needs immediate investigation.
i want to know what's been flying through our skies!!!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Watched blinking red lite for over an hour. the lite hovered, moved east, then hovered and moved west.

content.detailedDescription:
This is not a ufo siting.  it is an observation about the moon.

i arrived at my work at the ithaca city school district this morning at 6:14 a.M. and went into the board building to take care of some things.  then, at 6:35 a.M., i had to go to another building. upon exiting my building, i looked up and the sky was very clear.  it was still completely dark out, and the moon was crystal clear and very bright to look at.  

at this point, i noticed a definite electric blue glow around the moon -- less/thinner on the rounded side (left) and a wider band on the flatter side (right).  the bands of blue were not from the edge of the moon outwards, like a lighting effect shining off the moon, but inside the perimiter of the moon itself covering the actual white part of the moon.  it did not appear in the darkness around the moon. 

at first, i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me, so i covered one and then the other to see if perhaps one eye was spazzing out or something.  what i saw with both eyes, i saw also with each one individually.  then i thought maybe my eyes are watering, so i blinked, but there were no excess tears to wipe away.  next, i looked at the stars.  the sky was very clear and stars were everywhere.  none of them had a hint of this electric blue color to them.

this seemed very strange to me.  i don't remember ever having seen this effect before.  i thought perhaps it was the proverbial "blue moon," which must not happen very often, since the phrase "once in a blue moon" seems to have the connotation of "not very often" or "almost never."  and, i always thought the "blue moon" was a full-moon.

it was probably some kind of optical effect, though i'm curious to know if anyone else has seen it, or if my eyes truly were playing a trick on me.
content.summary: Blue color around the moon
